meanings.definition: A building that functions as both a shop and a residence.
meanings.sent1: The shophouse on the corner sells groceries and has a family living upstairs.
meanings.sent2: I walked past the shophouse with a bakery below and apartments above.
meanings.sent3: The shophouse with a candy store on the first floor must have a sweet-smelling home above.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a shophouse, with thoughts displayed for all to see.
meanings.sent5: The colorful shophouse stood out among the plain buildings, drawing in customers.

meanings.definition: A type of commercial building with a shop on the ground floor and living quarters above.
meanings.sent1: The old shophouse had a bookstore below and cozy rooms upstairs.
meanings.sent2: People enjoy living in a shophouse because they can work and rest in the same building.
meanings.sent3: The shophouse with a toy store below must have playful dreams floating above.
meanings.sent4: His heart felt like a shophouse, with love displayed openly for all to see.
meanings.sent5: The historic shophouse told stories of the past through its architecture and design.
